data.title: CSUN — Deluxe
data.text:
Anna Lee, Chief Strategy Officer

Media and entertainment veteran Anna Lee is the global Chief Strategy Officer at Deluxe Media where she oversees business development, marketing, communications, DEIB, strategic partnerships and growth initiatives for its portfolio of businesses including digital cinema, localization and platform and fulfillment.

Lee was an executive at Netflix for 12 years, serving as its VP Supply Chain Development and Content Acquisition and later added the additional roles of Head of Global Screenings and Head of Global Content Services, the position she most recently held at the streaming giant. Her 12-year career at Netflix was distinguished by innovative leadership and strategies she created and implemented in areas including asset deliverables and technical operations, optimization of operational efficiencies, creation, localization, and distribution of content assets in the digital cinema and platform spaces – as well as strategic partnerships and vendor relations in the promotion of Netflix’s global TV and film content.

Prior to her tenure at Netflix, Lee was Senior Vice President of Global Media Markets at Bertelsmann AG in New York. She is a cum laude graduate of The Wharton School.
